allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add TUI discussion - concluded with minimal approach

Decisions:
- No TUI library, raw fmt.Print output
- Simple aligned columns, no colors/borders
- No interactivity, pure CLI commands

Rationale: Human output is secondary \(agents auto-get TOON via
TTY detection\). Zero dependencies for secondary features.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(go run -exec '' - <<'EOF'
package main

import \(
	"fmt"
	"time"
\)

func main\(\) {
	now := time.Now\(\).UTC\(\)
	fmt.Println\("RFC3339:", now.Format\(time.RFC3339\)\)
	fmt.Println\("Expected:", now.Format\("2006-01-02T15:04:05Z"\)\)
}
EOF)
